title: Schema for a compiled, versioned Open Contracting Release.

Item.__comment: Does not have merge strategy fields as is always item in array, and array is versioned.

valuePerUnit.__comment: This is unversioned, as all items in item array will be versioned.

Milestone.__comment: Does not have merge strategy fields as is always item in array, and array is versioned.

Attachment.__comment: Does not have merge strategy fields as is always item in array, and array is versioned.
